member.name: T:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality
member.summary: Specifies the quality at which text is rendered.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.SystemDefault
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap, with the system default rendering hint. The text will be drawn using whatever font smoothing settings the user has selected for the system.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.SingleBitPerPixel
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap. Hinting is not used.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.SingleBitPerPixelGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap. Hinting is used to improve character appearance on stems and curvature.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.AntiAlias
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its anti aliased glyph bitmap without hinting. Better quality due to antialiasing. Stem width differences may be noticeable because hinting is turned off.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.AntiAliasGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its anti aliased glyph bitmap with hinting. Much better quality due to antialiasing, but at a higher performance cost.

member.name: F:Telerik.Charting.TextQuality.ClearTypeGridFit
member.summary: Specifies that each character is drawn using its glyph CT bitmap with hinting. The highest quality setting. Used to take advantage of ClearType font features.

member.summary: Specifies the quality at which image is rendered.

member.summary: Specifies high speed, low quality rendering.
